title: ADMIN - Block Incoming Orders/Checkout from being completed.

fields.label: Is checkout blocked?
fields.name: block_checkout
fields.instructions: DO NOT MODIFY HERE.

title: ADMIN - If users are able to update their order

fields.label: Are customers able to update their order?
fields.name: are_customers_able_to_update_their_order

fields.label: Author Name
fields.name: author_name
fields.instructions: Name of the reviewer

fields.label: Author Job
fields.name: author_job
fields.instructions: Job of the author

fields.label: Rating
fields.name: rating
fields.instructions: Rating of the review

fields.label: Characteristic Image
fields.name: characteristic_image
fields.instructions: Upload the image for this characteristic

fields.label: Taste-o-meter modal
fields.name: tasteometer_modal
fields.instructions: Enter in the content for the taste-o-meter popup that appears on the users dashboard as a "whats this?"

fields.label: Wine Choice modal
fields.name: wine_choice_modal
fields.instructions: Enter in the content for the Wine Choices popup that appears on the users dashboard. This is information for their selection of e.g 2 Reds and 2 White wines

fields.label: Product Dial (taste profile rating dial)
fields.name: product_dial
fields.instructions: This is the popup associated for the Taste Profile Dial that shows on individual products, this is general information explaining what the dial means.

fields.label: Display Promotional Banner?
fields.name: display_promotional_banner
fields.instructions: Decide if you want to show a promotional banner which appears at the very top of every page.

fields.label: Text for Promotional Banner
fields.name: text_for_promotional_banner
fields.instructions: Add the text to go in the promotional banner if it is toggled on.

fields.label: Alt Text for Promotional Banner
fields.name: alt_text_for_promotional_banner
fields.instructions: This shows when you are signed in instead.

fields.label: Footer Opening text
fields.name: footer_opening_text
fields.instructions: Text beneath the logo in the footer

fields.label: Header Logo (Main logo)
fields.name: header_logo_main_logo
fields.instructions: Upload the logo for the header of the site.

fields.label: Footer Logo
fields.name: footer_logo
fields.instructions: Upload the alternative version of the logo (should be in white)

fields.label: Internal Code
fields.name: internal_code
fields.instructions: Use if different from product sku

fields.label: Has the customer amended their order manually?
fields.name: customer_changed

fields.label: Red or White (this will determine if used in subscription box)
fields.name: red_or_white

fields.label: Wine Selection Carousel
fields.name: wine_selection_carousel
fields.instructions: Add the images and labels for wine selector carousel (this is for visual purposes and does affect any programmatical outcomes).

sub_fields.label: Bottles Image
sub_fields.name: bottles_image
sub_fields.instructions: Add the image of the bottles (0 Red, 4 White; 1 Red, 3 White etc)

sub_fields.label: Label for Selection
sub_fields.name: label_for_selection
sub_fields.instructions: Add the text of their selection ("0 Red, 4 White")

sub_fields.label: Label amount
sub_fields.name: label_amount
sub_fields.instructions: DO NOT EDIT THESE! THIS IS USED TO DETERMINE THE WINE CHOICE IN THE CODE.

fields.label: Wine Selection Excerpt
fields.name: wine_selection_excerpt
fields.instructions: Text that goes beneath "See your wines" button

fields.label: Steps
fields.name: steps
fields.instructions: Add each step (discover your favourites, deliverys on us, cheers!)

fields.label: Image
fields.name: image
fields.instructions: Image on the left

fields.label: Featured Review
fields.name: featured_review
fields.instructions: Select a featured review to display

fields.label: Customer Taste Profile Value
fields.name: customer_taste_profile_value
fields.instructions: This is the customers taste profile value based on answers to the questions.

fields.label: Wine Selection
fields.name: wine_selection
fields.instructions: The wine types the customer wants each month

fields.label: Favourite hot drink
fields.name: favourite_hot_drink
choices: Tea with milk and sugar, or hot chocolate
Tea with milk or fruit tea
Coffee with milk and sugar, green tea, or black tea
Coffee with milk or black coffee with sugar
Black coffee or Espresso with no sugar

fields.label: Whats your take on salt
fields.name: whats_your_take_on_salt
choices: I add a lot to my food
I add some to my food
I cook with it, but rarely add more at the table
I can take it or leave it

fields.label: Where do you stand on artificial sweeteners in soft drinks
fields.name: where_do_you_stand_on_artificial_sweeteners_in_soft_drinks
choices: They make the drink taste very bitter
I can taste the difference compared to regular soft drinks and i'm not a fan
Tastes a bit odd but not too bad
I don't mind them at all
I prefer the taste compared to regular soft drinks

fields.label: Tell us your thoughts on these flavours
User Profile Alt
fields.name: user_profile_alt
fields.instructions: Image used when no FB profile picture/override

fields.label: Featured
fields.name: featured
fields.instructions: DO NOT MODIFY IT HERE. ONLY MODIFY IT ON SUBSCRIPTIONBOX SECTION.

fields.label: Wine Exerpt
fields.name: wine_exerpt
fields.instructions: This is the excerpt underneath the main product information that sits adjacent to the data attributes, the dial, and the flavour characteristics

fields.label: Wine Dial Rating
fields.name: wine_dial_rating
fields.instructions: Choose a selection which will influence the dial for this product. The number will reflect where in particular the dial will be similar to the users profile.

fields.label: How to serve it
fields.name: how_to_serve_it
fields.instructions: Description on how to serve this wine

fields.label: Pairs well with
fields.name: pairs_well_with
fields.instructions: Description on what this wine pairs well with

fields.label: Alcohol Percentage
fields.name: alcohol_percentage
fields.instructions: Number only - please dont enter "%" as it will add it as a suffix to the numbers typed here

fields.label: Bottle Size
fields.name: bottle_size
fields.instructions: Enter the size e.g 0.7cl

fields.label: wine profile order
fields.name: wine_profile_order
fields.instructions:
Please enter in a NUMBER using the following Key:

Light White = 1
Medium White = 2
Full White = 3
Light Red = 4
Medium Red = 5
Full Red = 6

fields.label: Wine Profile
fields.name: wine_profile
fields.instructions: Select the wine profile. These will corrospond to subscribers wine preferences and select wines based on the profile + what is "featured" each month.

fields.label: Colour Circle
fields.name: colour_circle
fields.instructions: Select a colour to associate with this term (Red Wine)

fields.label: Colour Circle - White Wine
fields.name: colour_circle_white_wine
fields.instructions: Select a colour to associate with this term (White Wine)

fields.instructions: Add the main title

fields.name: steps

fields.instructions: Add the intro title (smaller heading)

fields.label: Main Title
fields.name: how_main_title
fields.instructions: Add the title

fields.label: Text
fields.name: how_text
fields.instructions: Add some descriptive text

fields.label: Steps

fields.instructions: Add each step (delivered to your door, pick your own bottles, always a vip member)

fields.label: Page Outro
fields.message: Page outro area before listed products

fields.label: Intro Title
fields.name: outro_intro_title
fields.instructions: Add the intro title (smaller heading)

fields.label: Title
